name: A Beautiful Day (itch)
description:
Nowadays, many of us find it hard to wake up and perform daily chores, let alone proceed to work on our assignments for the day. 

This game looks into doing everyday tasks and cultivating a sense of accomplishment within the player so that they get motivated to finish their own daily chores and regain a sense of control over their lives. 

A Beautiful Day is a game that looks into finding beauty and solace in doing everyday tasks.
